mapper.sql: id, xdid, serid, choid, czid, chezhanName, typeTime, isNot,isNotFinish, plan_start_time, plan_end_time, actual_start_time, actual_end_time, plan_open_time, actual_open_time, createTime, createName, updateTime, updateName
mapper.select:
SELECT bb.*, aa.* FROM ( SELECT axss.id iid, ax.id dsss, ax.xianduantime, ax.tlj_name, ax.dwd_name, ax.xd_name, ax.xd_type, ax.xd_fenlei, ax.guanlianxiangmu, ax.worksid,
axsc.id dddd, axsc.xdid xdid, axsc.serid, axsc.choid cid, axsc.chezhanName, axsc.typeTime, axsc.isNot, axsc.plan_start_time, axsc.plan_end_time, axsc.actual_start_time, axsc.actual_end_time, axsc.plan_open_time, axsc.actual_open_time,
axss.id idd, axss.serviceName, axss.choose, axss.timeType, axss.isNotOver
FROM mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_Xiangmu_Service_Choose axsc, mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_xiangmu ax, mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_xiangmuServiceStatus axss WHERE axsc.xdid = ax.id AND axsc.serid = axss.id ) bb LEFT JOIN ( SELECT axssc.NAME name, axssc.id id, axssc.sid sid, axssc.isNotDaoHuo FROM mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_xiangmuServiceStatus axss, mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_xiangmuServiceStatus_choose axssc WHERE axss.id = axssc.sid ) aa ON bb.cid = aa.id where bb.xdid = #{xdid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT axsc.id, xdid, serid, choid, czid, chezhanName, typeTime, ax.serviceName FROM mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_Xiangmu_Service_Choose axsc, mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_xiangmuServiceStatus ax WHERE axsc.serid = ax.id GROUP BY serid ORDER BY timeType
select czid, chezhanName from mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_Xiangmu_Service_Choose where xdid = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY czid

SELECT axsc.czid FROM mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_Xiangmu_Service_Choose axsc inner join mro_chezhan c on axsc.czid=c.cid
and xdid=#{xdid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and c.cz_name like concat('%',#{czName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
GROUP BY axsc.czid
SELECT choid FROM mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_Xiangmu_Service_Choose WHERE serid = #{serid} GROUP BY choid
SELECT serid FROM mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_Xiangmu_Service_Choose WHERE xdid = #{id} GROUP BY serid
SELECT COUNT(chezhan.czid) FROM (SELECT czid FROM mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_Xiangmu_Service_Choose WHERE xdid = #{id} GROUP BY czid) chezhan

SELECT axsc.id, xdid, serid, choid, czid, chezhanName, typeTime, isNot, isNotFinish, plan_start_time, plan_end_time, actual_start_time, actual_end_time, plan_open_time, actual_open_time, ax.serviceName FROM mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_Xiangmu_Service_Choose axsc, mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_xiangmuServiceStatus ax WHERE axsc.serid = ax.id AND axsc.xdid = #{xdid} AND axsc.serid = #{serid} AND axsc.czid = #{czid} ORDER BY timeType

select axsc.id, xdid, serid, choid, czid, chezhanName, typeTime, isNot, isNotFinish, plan_start_time, plan_end_time, actual_start_time, actual_end_time, plan_open_time, actual_open_time, ax.serviceName FROM mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_Xiangmu_Service_Choose axsc, mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_xiangmuServiceStatus ax WHERE axsc.serid = ax.id and axsc.czid = #{czid,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY serid ORDER BY timeType
mapper.insert: insert into mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_Xiangmu_Service_Choose (id, xmid, serid, cid, chezhanName, typeTime, isNot, plan_start_time, plan_end_time, actual_start_time, actual_end_time, plan_open_time, actual_open_time, createTime, createName, updateTime, updateName) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{xmid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{serid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{chezhanname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typetime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isnot,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{planStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{planEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{actualStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{actualEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{planOpenTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{actualOpenTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_Xiangmu_Service_Choose
id,
xdid,
serid,
choid,

updateName,

mapper.update:
update mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_Xiangmu_Service_Choose
xdid = #{xdid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
serid = #{serid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
choid = #{choid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
czid = #{czid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
chezhanName = #{chezhanname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
typeTime = #{typetime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isNot = #{isnot,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isNotFinish = #{isNotFinish,jdbcType=INTEGER},
plan_start_time = #{planStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
plan_end_time = #{planEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
actual_start_time = #{actualStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
actual_end_time = #{actualEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
plan_open_time = #{planOpenTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
actual_open_time = #{actualOpenTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
createName = #{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updateName = #{updatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_Xiangmu_Service_Choose set xmid = #{xmid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, serid = #{serid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, chezhanName = #{chezhanname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, typeTime = #{typetime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isNot = #{isnot,jdbcType=INTEGER}, plan_start_time = #{planStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, plan_end_time = #{planEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, actual_start_time = #{actualStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, actual_end_time = #{actualEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, plan_open_time = #{planOpenTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, actual_open_time = #{actualOpenTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createName = #{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateName = #{updatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, xdid, serid, choid, czid, chezhanName, typeTime, isNot, isNotFinish, plan_start_time, plan_end_time, actual_start_time, actual_end_time, plan_open_time, actual_open_time, createTime, createName, updateTime, updateName from mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_Xiangmu_Service_Choose where serid = #{serid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and czid = #{czId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
